root: ^I do. You were right that your keys were stolen.
^Oh my god. How do you know?

Choice1: ^I know. But is that enough basis for an accusation?
Choice2: ^I trust your intuition, but is it enough to make an accusation?
DONE: ^No, of course not. But the full answer is much more complicated than that.
^Can you think of anyone who could have taken your keys from you?
^I- I don't know. It wasn't that coaster kid becasue, well... She's a literal coaster kid now.
^I don't think it was her parent, either. They've been sitting away from me most of the day until the murder happened.
